t:
As most of the world started dying from the virus, I stepped into my time machine to go back to a time before the pandemic.



As I stepped out of the machine coughing, and with a fever and headache, I realized how the infection started in the first place.
c:
From the last person to die, now I'm the first.



#infection #virus #pandemic #world #dying #escape #timetravel #bringback
